content: project is described under section 3.3 of the revised MR. CAR-O5 is closed. CAR 06 MR-Section 3.2: The following are missing in the table ° Type of the energy meters used Calibration ‘details of the energy meter The details of energy meters as per | the requirement has been included in | the revised MR. It now has details of | | ee" (Pe, serialnumber and calibration. The meter type, serial number and calibration details are now rightly included in the section 3.2 of MR. . CAR-06 is closed. CAR 07 MR-Section 3.3: Apportioning procedure for Energy | generation of project WTGs is not given. The section 3.3 of the revised MR has | been updated with the method used for | apportioning of electricity share from | the project activity out the bulk meter | reading at Government Substation | JMR using the PSS/controller reading | share. The apportioning procedure for energy generation of project WTGs are now explained in the section 3.3 of MR. The same is cross verified by recalculating the final values from PSS/controller & GSS readings and found to be correct. The same is confirmed during the interview with the DISCOM personnel. CAR-07 is closed
